input_email_body:
Subject: Support Request for System Outage

An unexpected system outage has impacted key tools used for investment optimization, potentially due to a recent software update My name is Carlos Mendoza.. After attempting a reboot, the affected applications still encounter issues. This outage has caused significant disruptions to operations and requires immediate assistance to resolve. I would appreciate it if you could look into this matter urgently and provide a solution as soon as possible You can reach me at carlosm@gmail.com.. Please let us know if there is any additional information needed.
